text: The pestle-tailed worm lizard (Dalophia pistillum) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in southern Africa. ==References== == External link == * Worm Lizards of South Africa Category:Dalophia Category:Reptiles described in 1895 Category:Taxa named by Oskar Boettger
title: Pestle-tailed worm lizard
